alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 1:22PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Rockdale, central Walton and northeastern Newton Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 122 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Walnut Grove, or 8 miles southwest of Monroe, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conyers, Monroe, Covington, Loganville, Social Circle, Walnut Grove, Between, Jersey, Georgia International Horse Park, Youth, Pannell, Herndonville, and Gum Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
